messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: Standing up for Warrington Hospital. Stefan and the Liberal Democrats would end the neglect of the NHS and social care to ensure that these essential services work for local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stefan and the Liberal Democrats would end the neglect of the NHS and social care.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Right Home In The Right Place
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats will ensure we build the right homes in the right places.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats would fight against a hard Brexit.
issues.education: Stefan and the Liberal Democrats would oppose school cuts.
issues.health: Stefan and the Liberal Democrats would end the neglect of the NHS and social care.

housing.content: Liberal Democrats will ensure we build the right homes in the right places.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm Stefan Krizanac, your local Liberal Democrat candidate. I've lived locally with my family for over 14 years...

images.caption: Stefan and a group holding Liberal Democrats signs.
